title: Die Weinstube Nachhaltig Geniessen
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, German
description: An innovative sustainable vegan restaurant, with a view of the Moselle River, is situated inside the Hotel Nicolay Zur Post in an historic building founded in 1881. Mushroom cultivation is a highlight of restaurant that can be viewed through the glass floor. Free Wi-Fi. Name in English: The Sustainable Wine Bar Enjoy. Takes reservations.
